DOC.brief_summary: this study will perform to compare the results and functional outcomes of tibial plateau fractures treated with non-locking and locking plate fixation.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Tibial Plateau Fractures Outcomes Treated With Non-locking and Locking Plate
DOC.criteria: unilateral closed tibia plateau fracture patients who have been treated with casting or screw history of diabetes mellitus evidences of pathological fractures
